story.title: Woven with Passion
story.subtitle: It's not just fabric. It’s a feeling of home, a connection to nature, a story of love.
story.introP1: Our story isn’t a business plan. It's a love story. A story that begins with the simple, undeniable pleasure of being wrapped in something truly soft, something that breathes with you. It’s the feeling of a lazy Sunday morning, a warm hug, the gentle comfort you’ve always known. That’s muslin. That’s Saru.
story.section1p1: We fell in love with muslin not for what it is, but for how it makes us feel. The way its open weave allows air to kiss the skin, making it a companion for every season.
story.section1p2: It’s the incredible transformation it undergoes, becoming softer and more personal with every wash, telling a story on its very threads. This isn't fast fashion. It's slow living. It's choosing a garment that becomes a part of your life, a reliable friend that offers comfort without asking for anything in return.
story.section2p1: Our passion extends to how each piece is created. We chose to work with artisans who share our reverence for the craft, whose hands carry generations of knowledge.
story.section2p2: We use natural, plant-based dyes that give our fabrics their gentle, earthy tones, ensuring that what touches your skin is as pure and kind as nature itself. Each fiber is a testament to a slower, more thoughtful way of life.
story.section3Title: More Than Clothing, It's a Choice
story.section3p1: In a world of constant noise and speed, we seek out the quiet moments, the simple joys. Wearing Saru is an act of choosing that simplicity. It's an invitation to find beauty in imperfection, to value comfort as a form of self-care.
story.section3p2: It's about feeling connected—to your body, to the planet, and to the hands that crafted your garment. It's a quiet rebellion against the disposable, and a celebration of things made to last, to be loved, and to be lived in.
story.outroP1: Choosing Saru is choosing to wear a piece of a story woven with passion, integrity, and a deep love for the simple magic of muslin. We invite you to join us on this journey, to wrap yourself in comfort, and to make our story a part of yours.

whySaru.title: Why Saru?
whySaru.subtitle: The Simple Magic of Muslin Fabric
whySaru.p1: Saru is more than just a name; it's our word for muslin, a fabric cherished for centuries for its unique qualities. We chose muslin not just for its beauty, but for the incredible benefits it brings to your daily life. It's a fabric that cares for you, just as we care for the way it's made.
